register.description: This register enables the CPU domain power state transition. It controls the HW supervised domain power state transition between ON-ACTIVE and ON-INACTIVE states. It also holds 1 status bit per clock input of the domain.

bitfield.description: Controls the full domain transition of the CPU domain.

bitenum.description: NO_SLEEP: Sleep transition cannot be initiated. Wakeup transition may, however, occur.
SW_WKUP: Start a software forced wakeup transition on the domain.0x1: Reserved
HW_AUTO: Automatic transition is enabled. Sleep and wakeup transition are based upon hardware conditions.

register.description: This register manages the CPU clocks.
